Information

These Texts is a collection of messages Iâ€™ve received from people I know, or knew at some point. The messages are organized chronologically.

While the messages date back as far as 2014, I began collecting and posting them in September 2016. The project is somewhat inspired by Jamie Livingstonâ€™s Some Photos of That Day, Miranda Julyâ€™s We Think Alone, and the slew of similar stuff already out there.

Questions, comments, concerns? Text me.
